prod_name: Make him pay for it PREMIUM
detail_desc: Long cardigan knitted in a soft wool and alpaca blend with low dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and ribbing around the cuffs and hem. No buttons.
Sports shorts in a double layer of fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, mesh key pocket in the waistband and short slits at the hems.
Fine-knit jumper with a motif on the front, long, slightly puffed sleeves, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a soft, rib-knit cotton blend with a deep V-neck and long, wide sleeves.
Top in soft, printed fleece with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short, V-neck dress in a viscose weave with narrow adjustable shoulder straps. The dress has a double layer of fabric at the top and narrow elastication at the waist. Unlined.

5-pocket, slim-fit jeans in washed denim with a regular waist, zip fly and gently tapered legs. The jeans are made from selvedge denim – a high-quality denim woven on traditional shuttle looms with a distinctive red/white selvedge that stops the fabric from unravelling. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.
Hi-tops in imitation leather with a lightly padded edge and tongue, and lacing at the front. Mesh linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Sandals with wide, crossover straps at the front and elastic at the back. Imitation leather insoles and rubber soles.
Round-necked blouse in woven fabric with an opening and concealed button at the back of the neck, and 3/4-length sleeves with a flounced trim.
Double-layered hat in soft, fine-knit merino wool with a small, sewn-on appliqué at the front of the hem.
Sleeveless dress in a crêpe viscose weave with a V-neck, gathers at the shoulders and neck and an elasticated seam under the bust with ties.
Oversized jumper in a soft knit with a deep V-neck, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Sleeveless bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs at the crotch.
Fine-knit tights in a soft cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Long coat in a wool blend with a lined hood, side pockets, a tie belt at the waist and no fasteners. Lined.
Jumper in a soft rib knit with a V-neck front and back, decorative crossover straps at the back, dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Blouse in a viscose and linen weave with a small stand-up collar. V-neck opening at the front, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and an elasticated seam at the back of the waist.
Double-breasted checked coat woven in a soft viscose blend with peak lapels, buttons down the front, welt front pockets and a single back vent. Lined.
Fully lined patterned bikini. Top with a wide flounce at the top that continues back over the shoulders. Matching bikini bottoms.
KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Hairband in an organic cotton weave with a decorative knot at the top and covered elastication at the back.
Lined balconette bikini top with underwired, lightly padded cups, side support and decorative gathers at the front. Detachable, adjustable shoulder straps and ties at the back.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with a cable-knit front, detachable tie belt under the bust and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a fine knit containing some wool with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Blouse in a crêpe weave with a sweetheart neckline, drawstring down the front and a smocked back. Elastication over the shoulders and short, elasticated puff sleeves. Unlined.
Dress in soft jersey with a patterned tulle skirt. Print motif on the front, short cap sleeves and a glittery elastic waistband. Satin-lined skirt.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with a fluffy finish. Motif on the front, long sleeves and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Long-sleeved tops in soft cotton jersey with a narrow trim around the neckline. Two printed tops and one in a solid colour.
Baby Exclusive. Fully lined, sleeveless romper suit in soft organic cotton corduroy with a round neckline, buttons down the front and a seam at the waist. Lined in marled organic cotton jersey.
Metal rings, two of which are decorated with plastic stones.
Short, flounced dress in an airy weave with a V-neck and sewn-in wrapover. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a narrow, elasticated seam at the waist and a gently bell-shaped skirt. Lined.
5-pocket trousers in washed cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly with a button.
Bikini. Lined top with a wide flounce and narrow, double shoulder straps that join to create a braided racer back. Lined bottoms.
Jacket in soft pile with front pockets, a hood with ear appliqués on top, and a zip down the front with a chin guard.

prod_name: CO-LAB Sarah tocca Bocca SG s
detail_desc: TOCA LIFE X H&M. Trainers in patterned imitation leather with a pile appliqué at the back, a padded top edge, elasticated lacing at the front and loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles.
One-shoulder top in organic cotton jersey with 3/4-length sleeves.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Long sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Calf-length skirt in cotton twill with a high waist and detachable belt in imitation leather with a metal buckle. Pleats at the front, covered elastication at the back, a zip fly and front pockets. Unlined.
Twill cap with an appliqué on the front and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Calf-length skirt in an airy, patterned cotton weave with narrow elastication and a frill trim at the waist and flare to the hem with a gathered flounce. Unlined.

Blouse in a viscose weave with a button placket and a lace yoke at the front. Long sleeves with gathered seams at the shoulders and narrow elastication at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Scarf in a soft jacquard weave with fringes on the short sides.
Oversized jumper in a soft cable knit with a polo neck, low dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves. Straight hem and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Hat in soft, fine-knit cotton with a ribbed turn-up at the hem with a small appliqué on the front.
Long coat in felted fabric with a tie belt at the waist and no buttons. Welt side pockets, one inner pocket and a single back vent. Lined.

Set with a short-sleeved bodysuit and pair of shorts in organic cotton. Jersey bodysuit with a button placket, sewn-in turn-ups on the sleeves and press-studs at the crotch. Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with wide, foldover ribbing at the waist, decorative buttons at the front and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Hand-made, oversized coat in a felted wool blend with a collar, covered press-studs down the front, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and diagonal front pockets. Unlined.
Prolong the life of your favourite clothes. Mend, patch and continue to wear them. The patches can be ironed onto garments.
Metal earrings with a plastic rose at the top and three fabric tassels underneath. Length 10 cm.
Shorts in stretch cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist (except in sizes 12-14+Y). Zip fly, front and back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Wide sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with low dropped shoulders, short sleeves and short slits in the sides. Longer at the back. The polyester content of the top is partly recycled.
Top in organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves with a print motif and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
Set in soft cotton jersey with a dress and leggings. Patterned dress with long sleeves and gathered tiers to the hem. Unlined. Ribbed, ankle-length leggings with an elasticated waist.
Shaping. 5-pocket jeans in washed denim with technical stretch that holds in and shapes the tummy, thighs and seat while keeping the jeans in shape. Regular waist and skinny legs.
Short, straight-cut dress in a viscose weave with a V-neck and half-length sleeves with slits and ties. Unlined.
Cardigan in a soft, loose knit containing some mohair with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and no buttons.

Short dress in sturdy cotton denim with a collar, buttons down the front, a chest pocket and detachable tie belt at the waist. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded, raw, fringed hem. Unlined.

Warm-lined boots in waterproof functional fabric with imitation leather details, an ankle-height shaft with a hook and loop fastening at the top, and reflective details. Fleece linings and insoles and chunky soles.

Shoulder bag in soft imitation leather that can also be used as a clutch. Concealed magnetic fastener at the top, a narrow, detachable shoulder strap and a zipped inner compartment. Height approx. 18 cm. Width approx. 26 cm.
Long-sleeved blouse in a viscose weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck and a flounce at the hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Cropped top in smocked jersey with a square neckline and short puff sleeves with elastication around the shoulders and hems. Overlocked edges around the sleeves and hem. The polyester content of the top is partly recycled.
Bolero in soft, fine-knit cotton with a faceted, heart-shaped button at the top and long sleeves.
Long top in soft cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline. Straight, relaxed fit with long sleeves and a curved hem.
3/4-length leggings in stretch jersey with an elasticated waist.
Short, gently fitted dress in woven fabric with a boat neck, concealed zip at the back, 3/4-length sleeves and wide cuffs with a slit and button. Unlined.
Ankle-length cigarette trousers in a stretch weave with a regular waist, concealed zip in one side, fake back pocket and tapered legs with slits at the hems.
5-pocket, low-rise jeans in washed denim with hard-worn details, a zip fly and button, and slightly wider, tapered legs.
Long T-shirt in jersey with sewn-in turn-ups on the sleeves.
Knee-length dress in ribbed jersey with long sleeves and a textured-knit, bell-shaped skirt. Unlined.

prod_name: BEANIE KNIT CHUNKY FUR POM POM
detail_desc: Hat in a soft rib knit with a faux fur pompom on top and a turned-up hem.

Round-necked T-shirt in a soft cotton blend. The T-shirt incorporates COOLMAX® functional fabric, a unique, soft, comfortable and fast-drying polyester fibre that efficiently wicks moisture while regulating temperature.
Trunks in stretch jersey with flatlock seams, an elasticated waist, lined front and mid-length legs. The cotton content of the trunks is organic.
Loose-fitting, V-neck top in soft viscose jersey with short sleeves and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
5-pocket shorts in washed denim with hard-worn details. High waist, button fly and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems with cut-off, raw edges.
Short swim shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist. Soft mesh inner shorts.

Short lace dress with a concealed zip at the back and long, slightly wider sleeves with narrow, covered elastication at the cuffs. Fitted at the top, a seam at the waist and a wide, circular skirt. Lined.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist, ties at the sides and medium coverage at the back.
Printed swimming trunks with an elasticated, drawstring waist and lined front.
Dungaree dress in slightly stretchy cotton twill with sewn-on shoulder straps and buttons down the front. Patch front pockets, back pockets, a seam at the waist and an A-line skirt.
